SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tbl_post p WHERE p.member_id = sm.id AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM tbl_donate_cert dc WHERE dc.id = p.id )) AS donateCertCount,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tbl_post p WHERE p.member_id = sm.id) AS totalPostCount,
sm.sponsor_name AS sponsorName, f.file_name AS fileName, f.file_path AS filePath
FROM tbl_sponsor_member sm LEFT JOIN tbl_member_profile mp ON mp.member_id = sm.id LEFT JOIN tbl_file f ON f.id = mp.id WHERE sm.id = #{sponsorId}
